entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Border's corner radius malform during expand animation #22499
  • Error when running the project as windows machine #22498
  • [Entry] [Android] Cursor makes undesired jumps with Masked Behavior #22497
  • Spans with FontAttributes do not render on Android (When Span.Text uses data binding) #22491
  • (1)Error running default MAUI/NET8 win10 solution. (2)Another user has already installed an unpackaged version of this app (3) Could not establish trust relationship for the SSL/TLS secure channel #22489
  • Adding value dynamically using parameters to the InputTextarea in the OnBindingContextChanged after some delay, the value not updated properly. #22486
  • XAML error is shown when the content of a DataTemplate is not a View #22485
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Run .NET Multi-platform App UI development problem run under Windows 10 #22482
  • Arabic Text Tap Gestures don't work on Label Spans in iOS #22480
    Backlog
  • Images do not layout correctly in Mac and iOS #22479
  • On Android, if there's more then one entry in ViewCell, the second entry calls the Unfocused event on every keystroke #22474
    Backlog

Closed

  • Frame and RadioButton conflict #20339
    Backlog
  • Application freezes when phone font size (or anything affecting UI) changes while app is running. #18284
    Backlog
  • [UITEST] CollectionView Enable Legacy Tests #19050
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Maui Android intent filter ActionView for MimeTypes not working #22261
    Backlog
  • ViewCells are not GC'ed on iOS, causing cascading memory leak #20195
    .NET 8 SR6
  • TabbedPage inside Grid works in debug mode, but throws exception in release mode (Copy of #16326) #22457
  • [MAUI]Adding 7 to D10 and continue clicking a few more times, then click ‘-’, the page will get stuck. #22478
  • [Windows] Cannot run `StyleTests.StyleClassAreCorrecltyMerged` unit test in Visual Studio #22355
  • the project needs to be deployed before we can debug. #22477
  • Has anyone done a human body keypoint test? #22464
  • It is not possible to unfocus an Entry and HideSoftInputOnTapped closes soft keyboard but does not remove focus from Entry #21053
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] Make "IsConnected" public #22500
    community ✨
  • Add switch to BlazorWebView to configure 'fire and forget' for Android Disposal #22496
    area-blazor
  • Some fixes I needed #22494
  • App Crash during Scroll Animation while navigating away from Page - fix #22492
    area-animation, community ✨
  • [X] rename XFC to XC #22488
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Bugfix/22469 ios label crash #22487
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [UI Testing] Renamed Compatibility UITests projects #22484
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [WinUI] Optimize `TransformationExtensions` #22481
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button

Merged

  • [Housekeeping] Moved Issue20696 to the correct new TestCases path #22483
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-controls-collectionview, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 bring arcade #22463
    area-infrastructure
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leaks in `*Cell` #22067
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-listview, memory-leak 💦
  • [net9.0] Update to net9 preview5 #22399
    area-infrastructure
  • [arcade] Apps need to use ApplicationDisplayVersion for the version #22472
  • enable css for StackBase, remove for StackLayout #22419
    community ✨

Updated

  • [net9.0] Merge main net9.0 bring arcade #22447
    area-infrastructure
  • Prevent measure in flexlayout during arrange pass #22411
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, layout-flex
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Just trigger SizeChanged when Window size changes #22413
    community ✨, area-controls-window
  • [X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match #22056
    area-xaml
  • Fix Android ImageButton background, ripple and padding #22298
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-button
  • Stop Android from pinning native references to system services #22281
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials, community ✨, Backlog
  • Binding source generator #21725
    area-xaml
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #21304
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [iOS] Fix AdaptiveTrigger not working as expected #20987
    t/bug, area-xaml, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-window
  • [UI Test] Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #21897
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, area-keyboard
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-gestures
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Android] Fix shadow scaling issue #17902
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-gestures, Under Consideration
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests #21840
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Windows] Fix crash using ScrollTo on CollectionView #19921
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • [XC] Fix LogWarningOrError #22454
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, Under Consideration
  • [Android] ImageButton Border does not fit to CornerRadius - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Previously selected item cannot be reselected fix #21490
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Flyout IsGestureEnabled fix #21686
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Minor optimization for `MergedStyle.SetStyle` #21540
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • [iOS] Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated #22213
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-webview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
